Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class MasterController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.MasterController
public class MasterController
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MasterController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean activateLeader​(int leaderCode, int playerTurnOrder)
    this method checks if the player can activate his leader and if correct activates it and returns true
    boolean activateProduction​(boolean slot1Activation, boolean slot2Activation, boolean slot3Activation, boolean baseProductionActivation, java.lang.String baseInputResource1, java.lang.String baseInputResource2, java.lang.String baseOutputResource, boolean leaderSlot1Activation, int leader1Code, java.lang.String leader1ConvertedResource, boolean leaderSlot2Activation, int leader2Code, java.lang.String leader2ConvertedResource, int playerTurnOrder)
    this method checks if the requested production is viable and if correct saves the cost of the production in the turnInfo and returns true
    boolean addPlayerToGame​(java.lang.String username)
    this method adds a player to the game with the username, if username was already selected return false and does not register
    boolean buyDevCard​(char devCardColour, int devCardLevel, int playerTurnOrder)
    this method checks if requested card is buyable from the player and if correct saves the cost in the turnInfo and returns true
    boolean buyDevCardIfPlayerPayedTheCorrectAmountOfResources​(int chestCoins, int chestStones, int chestServants, int chestShields, int storageCoins, int storageStones, int storageServants, int storageShields, int playerTurnOrder)
    this method checks and executes if the player selected the correct amount of resources to pay from storage or from chest and if correct saves everything in the turnInfo and returns true
    boolean buyFromMarket​(int marketPosition, int playerTurnOrder)
    this method tries to buy from the market and if correct saves everything in the turnInfo and returns true
    boolean checkAndRefactorRequestedResourcesToBuyFromMarket​(int stones, int shields, int servants, int coins, int playerTurnOrder)
    this is a very important method that basically does all checks for the leader effect of market conversion of white marble and also refactors based on that the players bought resources in the TurnInfo class
    boolean checkIfIAmTheFirstToConnect()
    this is the method every thread calls at first to check if they are the one that has to ask his player to specify the game's number of player
    boolean checkIfMainActionWasCompleted()
    returns false if main action isn't totally completed
    boolean createGame​(int numOfPlayers)  
    void discardAllRemainingResourcesAndGiveFaithPoints​(int playerTurnOrder)
    this method discards all remaining bought resources and saves everything in the turnInfo
    boolean discardLeader​(int leaderCode, int playerTurnOrder)
    this method checks if the player can discard his leader and if correct discards it and returns true
    boolean discardOneResourceAndGiveFaithPoints​(java.lang.String resourceType, int playerTurnOrder)
    this method tries discard a bought resource and if correct saves everything in the turnInfo and returns true
    void doLorenzoAction()
    this is the method that the serverThread calls, before calling the end turn method, if their client requested the endTurn and if they checked that the game is a single player game
    int[] drawFourLeaderCards()
    this method returns an array of 4 integers that are drawn randomly from a limited pool of values from 1 to 16 and cannot be drawn multiple times with subsequent calls (once drawn they are removed from the pool) this is to assure that two players don't draw the same initial leader card
    void endedConfiguration()
    this is the method that each thread calls when their client has ended their initial configuration
    int endTurnAndGetNewCurrentPlayer()
    SECOND ONE OF TWO NEEDED SYNCHRONIZED METHODS FOR THE GAME
    boolean executeProductionIfPlayerPayedTheCorrectAmountOfResources​(int chestCoins, int chestStones, int chestServants, int chestShields, int storageCoins, int storageStones, int storageServants, int storageShields, int playerTurnOrder)
    this method checks and executes if the player selected the correct amount of resources to pay from storage or from chest and if correct saves everything in the turnInfo and returns true
    int getCurrentTurnOrder()
    FIRST ONE OF TWO NEEDED SYNCHRONIZED METHODS FOR THE GAME
    Game getGame()
    IMPORTANT: only used to set the game of the updateBroadcaster, DO NOT USE for anything else
    int getGameNumberOfPlayers()  
    int getPlayerTurnOrder​(java.lang.String username)  
    TurnInfo getTurnInfo()
    this method is called by the server threads to do some checks and to send back some info to the client
    void giveFaithPointsToOnePlayer​(int numberOfPoints, int playerTurnOrder)  
    boolean giveInitialResourcesToPlayer​(java.lang.String resource1, java.lang.String resource2, java.lang.String username)  
    boolean giveLeaderCardsToPLayer​(int cardCode1, int cardCode2, java.lang.String username)  
    boolean hasActiveLeaderWithMarketAction​(int playerTurnOrder)  
    void hasConfigurationEnded()
    this method is used by thread of the client with turnOrder 1 to check when they can broadcast the initial updates for the views
    boolean isEndGameActivated()  
    boolean isSoloGameLost()  
    boolean moveOneResourceOfPlayer​(int fromSlotNumber, int toSlotNumber, int playerTurnOrder)
    this method tries to move one resource in the storage and if correct saves everything in the turnInfo and returns true
    boolean placeDevCard​(int slotNumber, int playerTurnOrder)
    this method checks if player selected the correct slot to place the bought dev card and if correct saves everything in the turnInfo and returns true
    boolean placeResourceOfPlayerInSlot​(int slotNumber, java.lang.String resourceType, int playerTurnOrder)
    this method tries to place a bought resource and if correct saves everything in the turnInfo and returns true
    void setInitialFaithPointsToEveryone()  
    boolean switchResourceSlotsOfPlayer​(int fromSlotNumber, int toSlotNumber, int playerTurnOrder)
    this method tries to switch two slots of a storage and if correct saves everything in the turnInfo and returns true

  • Method Details

    • checkIfIAmTheFirstToConnect

      public boolean checkIfIAmTheFirstToConnect()
      this is the method every thread calls at first to check if they are the one that has to ask his player to specify the game's number of player
      Returns:
      true if they are the first one, false if they are not the first one

    • drawFourLeaderCards

      public int[] drawFourLeaderCards()
      this method returns an array of 4 integers that are drawn randomly from a limited pool of values from 1 to 16 and cannot be drawn multiple times with subsequent calls (once drawn they are removed from the pool) this is to assure that two players don't draw the same initial leader card
      Returns:

    • hasConfigurationEnded

      public void hasConfigurationEnded() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      this method is used by thread of the client with turnOrder 1 to check when they can broadcast the initial updates for the views
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException
